title: Uber Landing Page Clone
description: Uber Landing Page Clone is a sleek and responsive replica of Uber’s homepage, designed using React, Vite, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion. It features smooth animations and a clean layout that mirrors the modern aesthetic and UX of the original site.

title: Iphone Page 3D
description: Iphone Page 3D is a visually engaging 3D landing page inspired by Apple’s design, built with React, Three.js, and GSAP. It features smooth animations and interactive elements that showcase an iPhone model in a dynamic and modern way.

title: Dog Woah
description: Dog Woah is a fun and user-friendly web app designed for discovering and exploring dog breeds. Built with React, Vite, and Firebase, it delivers a clean interface, responsive design, and real-time data features to enhance user interaction.

title: Spotify Interface
description: Spotify Interface is a sleek clone of the Spotify web player, built with Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS. It replicates the modern UI and layout of Spotify, showcasing responsive design and smooth user experience.

title: Portfolio Website Template
description: A customizable portfolio template for creative professionals with modern design and smooth animations.

title: Health & Fitness App
description: A mobile application for tracking fitness goals, nutrition, and workout routines with personalized recommendations.
